refmeta.refentrytitle: Using XPath queries to XML views

refsect1.title: XML serialization text
refsect1.para: You can get xml serialization text of the selected entity by the query
e.g. for given 'cat' xml view the full serialization text can be received by the query

refsect1.title: Select all columns instead of a serialization text
refsect1.para: You can select all columns of the selected entity instead of its serialization text by using __* option:
refsect1.programlisting:
XPATH [__* __view "cat"] //product
ProductID ProductName SupplierID CategoryID QuantityPerUnit UnitPrice UnitsInStock UnitsOnOrder ReorderLevel Discontinued INTEGER VARCHAR INTEGER INTEGER VARCHAR DOUBLE PRECISION SMALLINT SMALLINT SMALLINT SMALLINT ______________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
1 Chai 1 1 10 boxes x 20bags 8 39 0 10 0 2 Chang 1 1 24 - 12 oz bottles 19 17 40 25 0 3 Aniseed Syrup 1 2 12 - 550 ml bottles 10 13 70 25 0 . . . . . .
refsect1.para: This is only valid when __view is specified and the result set is homogeneous.
